questions_start: ^Ahh, that was a fun trip that we took when we were young, before we were even married. Do you remember where we got this?
^I can't even tell what this thing is. What the heck am I looking at?

b: ^C’mon Diane, you know this. It’s a place in the US… but… gosh, it’s at the tip of my tongue but it won’t come out.

c-0: ^This is a vehicle. I don't know if people actually use them anymore, but when we were there, this was the best way to get up and down the steep hills.
c-1: ^We were here in the 70s which was a really special time for this city. We went to poetry readings, music cafes, art galleries... the city was just exploding with culture at that time.
c-2: ^It was very far from where we lived then: New Jersey. But now that we live in Arizona, it's much closer, but still a few hours away by plane.

holdingKnot: ^I think that should give you a pretty good idea of where we got this. Do you remember where?
correctAnswer: ^That's right, San Francisco! Good job, Honey, I knew you could do it!
^He's treating me like a child! I knew it was San Francisco! Have I really gotten so forgetful that he thinks I don't remember our trip to California?
incorrectAnswer: ^Oh... no Honey, we got this in San Francisco. We went here when we were in our 20s, so it was a long time ago. Maybe this one is too hard.
^I thought the doctor said that it's mostly my short-term memoery that will be affected at this point... am I losing my long-term memory already?
